exceptions.tactic: apply divides_mult_inv_l in H2 as [H2x H2y].
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall p q r : nat, p * q <d r -> p <d r /\\ q <d r" on hypothesis of type "p <d x * y".

exceptions.tactic: destruct (prime_gcd p x H1) as [G | D].
exceptions.exn: The reference H1 was not found in the current environment.
The reference G was not found in the current environment.
Not an inductive goal with 2 constructors.

original: intros H1 H2. apply divides_mult_inv_l in H2 as [H2x H2y]. destruct (prime_gcd p x H1) as [G | D]. - right. apply (is_rel_prime_div_r p x y G). auto. - left. auto.
